name: Knallkrebs
description:
This game was made in 7 days for the Lost Relic Games game jam. The theme was
'Connection'.

Herman the Crab has a cybernetic claw which he can use to destroy bombs and spare fruits - because Herman loves fruits.

How to play

Use Left Mouse to enter aiming mode. Connect as many bombs as possible by clicking on them. You can't connect bombs if there are fruits between them! Use Right Mouse to shoot or cancel. Once you filled the Special Attack bar, use Space to trigger the special move!
